Parameters:

See Also:
textInput, textOutput

updateStyle

public void updateStyle()
The style of the text input, text output and max history entries are updated. This includes
  • foreground color of the output text field (color used to show the user input)
  • font and background color of the output text field
  • color for the returned values in the output text field
  • color and font of the input text field
  • maximum stored history entries

propertyChange

public void propertyChange(org.eclipse.jface.util.PropertyChangeEvent _event)
Updates after a property change the shell styles.

Specified by:
propertyChange in interface org.eclipse.jface.util.IPropertyChangeListener
Parameters:
_event - property change event (not used)
See Also:
updateStyle()

setFocus

public void setFocus()
If the shell gets focus, the text input field must get the focus.

Specified by:
setFocus in interface org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart
Specified by:
setFocus in class org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart
See Also:
textInput

execute

private void execute()
Executes current string in the input text field textInput. The string is added to the history entries of the last entry of the history is not the same or if the string is not an empty string. This string is added to the output text field together with the current amount of input strings defined with count. The returned values from the data base are added to the output text field textOutput with color colorOuput or, if an error was thrown, with color colorError.

See Also:
textInput, history, textOutput, colorOuput, colorError

prevHistoryEntry

private void prevHistoryEntry()
Shows previous entry of the history in the input text field.

See Also:
history, historyPos, textInput

nextHistoryEntry

private void nextHistoryEntry()
Shows next entry of the history in the input text field.

See Also:
history, historyPos, textInput

dispose

public void dispose()
If the shell is closed this instance must be removed as listener from workspace preference change events.

Specified by:
dispose in interface org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart
Overrides:
dispose in class org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart
